com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp

Interface MvpBasePresenter.ViewAction<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The Type of the View
    Enclosing class:
    MvpBasePresenter<V extends MvpView>

    public static interface MvpBasePresenter.ViewAction<V>
    An Action that is executed to interact with the view. Usually a Presenter should not get any data from View: so calls like view.getUserId() should not be done. Rather write a method in your Presenter that takes the user id as parameter like this: void doSomething(int userId){ // do something ... ifViewAttached( view -> view.showSuccessful()) }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(V view)
      This method will be invoked to run the action.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(V view)
        This method will be invoked to run the action. Implement this method to interact with the view.
        Parameters:
        view - The reference to the view. Not null.
